nodes.text: Beylyssa was a Human female bounty hunter who occasionally worked with Boddu Bocck, and tried to capture Platt Okeefe and Darrik while they were on Bespin. She was later present on the Vengeance when Dirk Harkness and Jai Raventhorn destroyed the ship. She also worked with the Ubese bounty hunter Boushh for a time; the two both had a love of all things explosive, though their partnership ended on less-than-amiable terms. She wore a suit of modified Arelik Armor.
